instruction: [INST] Analyze this file to learn MacBook motherboard repair. The 'definitions' section explains key technical terms. The 'threads' section contains real-world repair discussions. Use both sections to understand and learn how to troubleshoot MacBook issues. Posts from username 'larossmann' , 'dukefawks' , and '2informaticos' are posts from trusted experts.[/INST]

definitions.820-4924: What is 820-4924? a LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A Restarts with corrupt graphics.
threads.message: No sign of spillage on the board. I tried pram/Smc reset several times. After running Unigine valley it reboots and screen is garbled see pic. What is the most likely culprit or where to test first?.

threads.title: <LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>820-4924</LOGIC BOARD PART NUMBER>-A Restarts with corrupt graphics.
threads.message:
Should be RAM, or CPU.
Did you check external video?
If restarts, shouldn't be an internal LCD issue however.

Run a memory test...
